content.body: my takeaway from this poll is not "we need a bunch more syntax for accessors"

content.body: Maybe this proposal is pointing to a need to split off accessor from the decorators proposal so that it's not blocked on them?
`accessor` is sort of split off. It was originally introduced in Grouped and Auto-Accessors and brought over to decorators to meet implementor requirements
content.formatted_body: accessor is sort of split off. It was originally introduced in Grouped and Auto-Accessors and brought over to decorators to meet implementor requirements

content.body: I think I would prefer for these things to be reified as accessors and not directly visible in descriptors, to avoid making descriptors being more complicated
